::Astroblast/Switchblade::
"Foolish Maimal, do you wan't to kill this bot? Ignoring us will mean 
his death." states Astroblast, wondering how crazy these 
Maximal's are.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Switchblade follows Skullgrin, having to run to keep up. "Nice place 
ya got here."

On 28 Feb 2001, at 19:16, dcoburn wrote:

> ::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Orchestra::
> 
>         Triggerhappy decides to stop fighting Astro Train and company so he flies off to find Astroblast and Menasor, and see how they are doing.
> 
>         "Skullgrin can handle them for a while, but not for too long, so I gotta be quick," He said to himself.
> 
>          Triggerhappy zoomed off at full speed past Astro Train and them, and kept going until he was around the CF.  He flew over, and saw the battle.  He could see(and hear) Astroblast way out in the distance.  Triggerhappy flew off towards there, until he could just see Astroblast, Menasor 
and Element(and whoever else was there, such as Squawktalk).  
> 
>          "Astroblast, you and Menasor get outta there, I'll hold off this pest!" He said through his com to Astroblast.
> 
>            Triggerhappy flew closer(btw Jen D. Triggerhappy is a jet just so you know) and shot 2 photon cannon blasts at Element.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>          Skullgrin nodded.
> 
>          "Follow me," He said to Switchblade, walking into the base and heading to the control room, slow enough so Switchblade could catch up.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Orchestra decided to be a risk taker and fired 2 plasma bolts at Unicron.
>
